items.title: How to Measure Conversions and Micro-Conversions
items.description: Learn how to configure the SealMetrics pixel to track conversions and micro-conversions accurately while avoiding duplicate pageviews.

items.title: SealMetrics Dashboard at a Glance
items.description: Overview of the SealMetrics dashboard — explore visits, page views, conversions, micro-conversions, KPIs, and traffic insights.
